name: Hearthstone Lounge
location: Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & Spa, Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & Spa

items.title: $39 per adult, plus tax
items.description: Menu Items, Pricing, and Hours are subject to change without notice.

items.title: $22 per child (3-9), plus tax
items.description: Menu Items, Pricing, and Hours are subject to change without notice.

items.title: Chicago Whistle
items.description: Whistle Pig Piggy Back 6yr Rye Whiskey, Clover Honey, Grapefruit Juice

items.title: Smokey Gardens
items.description: Del Maguey Vida Mezcal, Grapefruit Juice, Lime Juice, Falernum, Grapefruit Soda

items.title: Royal Petal
items.description: Empress 1908 Gin, Meletti Limoncello, Lemon Juice, Lavender

items.title: Aviation Cocktail
items.description: Hendrick's Gin, Luxardo Maraschino, Crème De Violette, Lemon Juice

items.title: Silent Gate
items.description: Angel’s Envy Bourbon, Rhum Clement VSOP, Lemon Juice, Honey, Vanilla, Orange Bitters

items.title: Red Harvest Manhattan
items.description: Bevery High Rye Whisky, The Fableist Pinot Noir, Agave Nectar, Angostura Bitters

items.title: Curious Cabin
items.description: Don Julio Blanco Tequila, Prickly Pear, Orinoco Bitters, Lime Juice

items.title: Meadow Punch
items.description: Zacapa 23 yr Solera Rum, Hibiscus Liqueur, Earl Grey Tea & Elderflower, Lemon

items.title: Bubbly Rouge
items.description: Ketel One Grapefruit Rose Botanical, Schramsberg Blanc de Blancs, Lemon Juice

items.title: Redwood Peacock
items.description: Hanson of Sonoma Habanero Vodka, Mathilde Poire Liqueur, Pomegranate Juice, Ginger Beer

items.title: Hearthstone Old Fashioned
items.description: The Beverly, Orange Wine Cask Finished, Blended American Whiskey, Angostura Bitters, Sugar Cube and Smoked Orange Peel

items.title: Paradisi Patch
items.description: Fever-Tree Sparkling Pink Grapefruit, Falernum, Lime Juice, Grapefruit Juice, Garnished with a Grapefruit Wheel

items.title: Crisp Spring
items.description: White Grape Juice, Premium Sparkling Mineral Water, Mint, Pomegranate Seeds, Garnished with Green Grape Halves

items.title: Peach Meadows
items.description: Peach Juice, Topo Chico®, Sage Essence, Lemon Juice, Garnished with a Lemon Wedge

items.title: Orchard Swig
items.description: Apple Cider, Cinnamon, Orgeat, Ginger Beer, Garnished with a Cinnamon-Dusted Apple Slice and Luxardo Cherries

items.title: Hearthstone Cobb Salad

items.description: Point Reyes Toma Cheese, Canadian Bacon, Tomato, Arugula, served with Potato Chips

items.title: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Pasture-raised Chicken, Gouda Cheese, Avocado, Bacon, Tomato, Lettuce, Habanero Aïoli, Brioche Bun, served with Potato Chips

items.description: Fresh Mozzarella, Fresh Basil, Fire-roasted Tomatoes, Artisan Cheese Blend
